overview: A behind the scenes look at the making of the movie M*A*S*H. The documentary reveals all of the chaos, politics, and conflict that was going on behind the scenes during production of the movie through new interviews done with director Robert Altman as well as Richard Zanuck, who was head of production for 20th Century Fox at the time, and others.
tagline: A look behind the making of the movie M*A*S*H.
title: Enlisted: The Story of 'M*A*S*H'
